做個小統計:
09-10嗰年我紐好似好屈機，贏第二西布朗成11分(102 vs 91)
紐46場102分，平均每場~2.22分
西46場91分，平均每場~1.98分
森林排第三79分，每場先得~1.72分

今季暫時紐36場77分，平均每場都有~2.14分
如果到最後都保持呢個水準，預計最後會有98分，其實同當年好接近

但望下白禮頓(~2.06分 )同哈多士(~1.94分 )，大家就會知道對比上一次踢英冠，今次嘅爭標對手係勁咗

如果再睇護級組，除咗洛達咸係送分童子之外，英冠排尾二嘅韋根都接近每場一分(~0.94分)，同哈多士大概每場相差一分
仲要韋根已經叻過英超排尾四嘅水晶宮(~0.93分)，而英超平均分第三嘅曼城(~2.07分)都已經領先緊佢每場一分有突

結論係英冠各隊實力比英超更平均，09-10我紐屈機只不過係對手相對易打
16-17我紐係有好多改善空間，但已經算係咁喇
季前點估到踢咗36場仲有得坐榜首

He said: “My feelings when I walked on the pitch were similar to what I have been feeling all year.

“The fans have been amazing with me, their loyalty and everything it means to being a top team like this, with the city behind you.

“That is why I decided to stay, and now I am even happier than before that I made this decision.

“I am really proud and really pleased.”

When asked about recruitment and the future, he said: “Now is the time to enjoy what we have done.

“I am sure if we do the right things, we have to prepare everything to be strong enough for the Premier League.

“We have to wait and enjoy it, play another two games and see where we are.”

Benitez was also asked in his post-game Press conference if he would be here next season.

He responded: “You never know, that is football. I am really pleased to be here, and really happy and proud for everything we have achieved.

“Hopefully, we can put in the foundations for something that will be a guarantee for the future.

“What we need is to enjoy today, and after we will see where we are.”

He said: “My feelings when I walked on the pitch were similar to what I have been feeling all year.

“The fans have been amazing with me, their loyalty and everything it means to being a top team like this, with the city behind you.

“That is why I decided to stay, and now I am even happier than before that I made this decision.

“I am really proud and really pleased.”

When asked about recruitment and the future, he said: “Now is the time to enjoy what we have done.

“I am sure if we do the right things, we have to prepare everything to be strong enough for the Premier League.

“We have to wait and enjoy it, play another two games and see where we are.”

Benitez was also asked in his post-game Press conference if he would be here next season.

He responded: “You never know, that is football. I am really pleased to be here, and really happy and proud for everything we have achieved.

“Hopefully, we can put in the foundations for something that will be a guarantee for the future.

“What we need is to enjoy today, and after we will see where we are.”
